      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void Canvas.addSprite(Sprite sprite)
      Adds a sprite to this Canvas by placing it in Canvas.sprites, which it ensures remains sorted.

      Updates the sorted set of Sprites and the screen when a Sprite's Z property is changed.

      Handler for CollidedWith events, called when two sprites collide.

      Determines whether two sprites are in collision.
      boolean Sprite.CollidingWith(Sprite other)
      Indicates whether a collision has been registered between this sprite and the passed sprite.
      protected void Canvas.findSpriteCollisions(Sprite movedSprite)
      Checks if the given sprite now overlaps with or abuts any other sprite or has ceased to do so.
      void Sprite.NoLongerCollidingWith(Sprite other)
      Handler for NoLongerCollidingWith events, called when a pair of sprites cease colliding.
      void Sprite.PointTowards(Sprite target)
      Turns this sprite to point towards a given other sprite.
      protected void Sprite.postEvent(Sprite sprite, java.lang.String eventName, java.lang.Object... args)
      Posts a dispatch for the specified event.
      (package private) void Canvas.registerChange(Sprite sprite)
      Indicates that a sprite has changed, triggering invalidation of the view and a check for collisions.
      (package private) void Canvas.removeSprite(Sprite sprite)
      Removes a sprite from this Canvas.
